charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1101_0100_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was taking a stroll
near the volcano when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] heard Flannery
call out from up ahead.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_0200_:
Hey, you don’t look so great.
Or am I just imagining things?
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_0302_0500_: Maybe I don’t feel so hot.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_0402_0600_: I knew it! Don’t worry—I know just the thing!
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_0700_:
When I’m not feeling so hot, I try to relax my body
and let out all my steam.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_0800_:
That’s something Torkoal taught me.
Now, whenever I see a volcano,
it makes me think of how I used to be.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_0401_1000_:
My grandfather was one of the Elite Four, 
and I’d felt pressured to live up to that 
since I was little.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_0402_1200_:
My grandfather was one of the Elite Four, 
and I’d felt pressured to live up to that 
since I was little.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_1300_:
I tried to get stronger as fast as I could,
but I was just running in circles.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_1400_:
Around that time, seeing Torkoal spouting out
smoke all the time like she always does got
me thinking.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_1500_:
How very Torkoal-like she was—never trying to
impress anyone.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_1600_:
Torkoal does her own thing, but there’s more to
it than that.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_1700_: See how she’s digging a hole?
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_1900_:
She’ll burn that coal up as she digs out a
little cave.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_2000_:
The smoke she spouts is how you know she’s
converting that coal into energy.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_2100_:
We may not notice it, but Torkoal is working
hard, little by little, to dig her caves. That’s what
made me realize something.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_2200_:
I was trying too hard. I needed to do things in my
own natural way—be myself instead of trying to
be someone I’m not.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_2300_:
I thought...if I could do that, I’d be able to become
who I’d always wanted to be. It didn’t matter that
my grandfather was one of the Elite Four.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_2400_:
Whenever I’d start to feel pressure, Torkoal was
always there for me—just doing her own thing
like she always does.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_2500_:
The caves that I’d make—or, in my case, the paths
I’d choose to walk down—would be up to me.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_2600_:
If I have been true to myself, when I get to 
the end of that dark, narrow cave...
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_2700_:
I’m sure there will be an awesome, bright-red,
world-shaking volcano waiting for me, like I
saw once a long time ago.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_2800_: And that’s how I feel now.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_2900_:
Ahhh! Although I try to stay focused on my dreams,
I still feel some pressure. I guess it’s inevitable!
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_3000_:
I’d been wanting to talk to you about this,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. Thanks for listening.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_0301_3100_: You made me feel better, too.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_0302_3300_: That was good for me to hear.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_3500_:
After all, you’re someone I look up to.
Sometimes I wish I could be more like
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_3600_:
Knowing that I made you feel better makes
me feel better, too!
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_3700_: I’m going to keep being myself from now on.
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_3800_:
Some people think they always have to work
superhard so they don’t get left behind...
charaepi_ch0029_00_asuna/2301_1201_3900_:
but I think it’s better to dig your own cave at
your own pace. Racing’s not worth it if it means
wearing yourself out!
